name: AI-Research-SKILLs (Orchestra-Research)
description: [项目级] Comprehensive open-source library of AI research and engineering skills for any AI model. Package the skills and your claude code/codex/gemini agent will be an AI research agent with full horsepower. Maintained by Orchestra Research.。来源: https://github.com/Orchestra-Research/AI-Research-SKILLs

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Comprehensive open-source library of AI research and engineering skills for any AI model. Package the skills and your claude code/codex/gemini agent will be an AI research agent with full horsepower. Maintained by Orchestra Research.

来源: https://github.com/Orchestra-Research/AI-Research-SKILLs
语言: TeX
Stars: 3677
